content: Hello! I am a new member here (also the first time using Zulip). Very impressed by the amount of channels! I'd like to ask about where I can read the proof of that the LEAN's formal system is 'equally strong' as ZF+some axiom.. which channel should I ask?
Thank you @Matthew Ballard ! I will take a look at that paper. Could you also tell me where I can talk more about it in this zulipchat site?
#Type theory is the general channel
